[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Real

abbrev omnimath2095_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath2095 :
  IsGreatest {p : ℝ | ∃ (f : Fin 6 → ℝ), 
    (∀ i, 0 ≤ f i) ∧ 
    (∑ i, f i = 1) ∧
    (f 0 * f 0 = 0.04) ∧ 
    (f 5 * f 5 = 0.01) ∧ 
    p = 2 * (f 0 * f 5 + f 1 * f 4 + f 2 * f 3)} 
  omnimath2095_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: f0=0.2, f5=0.1, f1=0.0, f4=0.0, f2=0.35, f3=0.35 => p=0.285
f0=0.2, f5=0.1, f1=0.01, f4=0.01, f2=0.33999999999999997, f3=0.33999999999999997 => p=0.2714
